sourcesContent:
Fecha de reserva {{element.position}} Numero de Comensales {{element.name}} Menus seleccionados {{element.weight}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { userService } from '../userService'; import { lastValueFrom } from 'rxjs'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reservas-personal', templateUrl: './reservas-personal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reservas-personal.component.css'] }) export class ReservasPersonalComponent implements OnInit{ displayedColumns: string[] = ['fechaReserva', 'comensales', 'menus']; dataSource :any; constructor(private http:HttpClient,private userService: userService){ } ngOnInit(): void { const req=this.http.post('http://localhost:8080/reservas/getReservasID',this.userService.getUser().id,{}); req.subscribe(aux =>{ this.dataSource=aux; }) } }
